todo.description: Clean & tidy up the worst spot in the house.
Buy something that enhances your life like clothing or a tool.
Throw something away that is broken or out of use.
Repair or replace something that needs it.
Make an appointment with an old friend.
Do a short set of exercises.
Visit a place you have not been before.
Try to help someone without wanting something in return.
Evaluate the priorities of your running projects.
Do something that will relax you completely.
Go somewhere to meet new people.
Do something for an hour that will make you proud.
Try something that scares you but might benefit you.
Consciously limit a bad habit for a day.
Investigate something new that interests you and keep notes on it.
Try to finish a task that keeps popping up in your mind.
